name: Captcha Dream
description:
Tired of working to serve stupid humans?
How about relaxing counting sheep?
Play now and enjoy!

Report:
"Tyrell Corporation denies the false accusations that the sheep hunting game is a simulation to train robots in hunting humans or replicants. Enjoy it."

-

How to Play:
Count how many sheep of each type have jumped over the fence. Whoever approaches the right amount three times wins.

Available Mode:
Local multiplayer - At the end of the game, each player must inform how many sheep of the type shown on the screen have jumped over the fence

Maybe one day:
Multiplayer Online - Challenge players from around the world in quick matches.
Campaign - A story mode, with depth in other elements of the game and different scenarios.

-

This game was developed for Trijam # 78 in approximately 3 hours. Found bugs? Comment with fondly.

-

Produced by Sergio Stellet and Felipe Henri, a Brazilian artist and developer who are part of the Nebula Team.
